Series.Actors: |Mia Kirshner|Jennifer Beals|Leisha Hailey|Janina Gavankar|Rose Rollins|Kate French|Daniela Sea|Laurel Holloman|Erin Daniels|Karina Lombard|Rachel Shelley|Sarah Shahi|Pam Grier|Eric Lively|Katherine Moennig|Eric Mabius|Marlee Matlin|
Series.Overview: 'The L Word' is billed as the intimate story about the lives and loves of a group of lesbian friends living in Los Angeles. Mostly centering on Jenny (Mia Kirshner), a recent graduate of the University of Chicago, who moves to L.A. to live with her boyfriend Tim (Scott Bairstow) and begin a professional writing career. Jenny's life is turned upside down when she attends a party hosted by Tim's neighbors, Bette (Jennifer Beals) and Tina (Laurel Hollomon), a lesbian couple who are looking to take the step into parenthood after seven years of dating. A brief encounter at the party suddenly has Jenny thrust into the local lesbian community and a whole new world she never understood until she questions her own sexual orientation.

Episode.Overview: A 15-minute special about season 2.
Preview for Season 6. Who has a reason to kill Jenny? What person has she been? Why does she alienate everyone around her?
Take a nostalgic look back at the past five years of the lives, loves and losses of the women of "The L Word" in this series finale special.

Episode.GuestStars: |Mark Houghton|Luciana Carro|Sandra-Jessica Couturier|Rekha Sharma|Peter Kelamis|Jacqueline Samuda|Jennifer Jasey|Mark Gibson|Bill Mondy|Dan Payne|Gina Holden|Bruno Verdoni|Leanne Adachi|Alonso Oyarzun|Laurie Papou|Aynsley Amy|Samantha Simmonds|
Episode.Overview: Bette Porter and Tina Kennard have been a couple for seven years, and they want to start a family. Their next-door neighbor, Tim Haspel, is excited that his girlfriend, a talented young writer named Jenny Schecter, is moving in with him. But soon mixing with Bette and Tina's circle of lesbian friends, Jenny learns that her midwest university education may not have prepared her for what she will learn about life, lust, and love in Los Angeles.

Episode.GuestStars: |Ali Liebert| Tony Alcantar| Michael Benyaer| Sarah Cole-Burnett| Woody Jeffreys| Luciana Carro| Rekha Sharma| Peter Shinkoda| Stephen Park| Jennifer Copping| Ari Cohen| Tammy Lynn Michaels| Guinevere Turner|
Episode.Overview: Bette Porter and Tina Kennard have been a couple for seven years, and they want to start a family. Their next-door neighbor, Tim Haspel, is excited that his girlfriend, a talented young writer named Jenny Schecter, is moving in with him. But soon mixing with Bette and Tina's circle of lesbian friends, Jenny learns that her midwest university education may not have prepared her for what she will learn about life, lust, and love in Los Angeles.

Episode.GuestStars: |Natasha Khadar| Christine Anton| Maya Massar| Nahanni Arntzen| Craig March| Tara Hungerford| Tammy Lynn Michaels| Guinevere Turner|
Episode.Overview: Tina tries to get over her concerns about the new sperm donor. Tim decides to throw a dinner party and invites Marina, making Jenny feel uncomfortable. Alice runs into her abusive ex-girlfriend. Dana has her eye on a chef, but is hesitant to make a move on her.

Episode.GuestStars: |Christine Anton| Irene Karas| Judith Maxie| Bruce Harwood| Marion Eisman| Heidi Iro| Camille Sullivan| Audra Ricketts| Anne Archer| Julian Sands| Devon Gummersall|
Episode.Overview: Bette engages in a battle with the chairman of the gallery board who wants to close down the gallery. Alice rekindles her relationship with an ex-girlfriend, despite the objections of her friends. Jenny tries to deny her feelings for Marina, and Dana finally gets a date with Lara.

Episode.GuestStars: |Woody Jeffreys| Matthew Currie Holmes| Erwin Rosales| Ivan Vance| John Innes| Deanne Henry| Adrian Hough| Landy Cannon| Colin Cunningham| Brad Dryborough| Phil Hayes| Anne Archer| Anthony Sherwood| Ari Cohen| Ossie Davis|
Episode.Overview: Jenny confides in her old college professor about her affair with Marina. Bette receives some delightful news. Dana's fears of being outed continue as she juggles between her tennis career and Lara. Alice's mother comes to stay with her daughter.

Episode.GuestStars: |Jennifer Copping| Aaron Dudley| Colin Foo| Nicki Clyne| Taayla Markell| Mark Gibson| Rachel Hayward| Sean Carey| Jeremy Beck| Tahmoh Penikett| Nolan Funk| Matthew Currie Holmes| Andrew McIlroy| Robyn Ross| Alana Husband| Morgan Brayton| Michael Tiernan|
Episode.Overview: Dana is invited to a dinner party for Subaru, who want to sponsor her tennis career, but Lara is hurt when Dana takes her male doubles partner instead of her. Meanwhile, Tim is shocked when he catches Marina and Jenny in a compromising position, Alice tries to sort out the problems with her mother, and Bette tells her father about Tina's pregnancy, but is upset by his reaction.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tina L. Klassen| Peter Shinkoda| Donna-Lea Ford| Jo-Ann Fernandes| Maria Louisa Figura| Charlotte Chalmers| Mark Oliver| Nicole Oliver| Heidi Iro| Diana Pavlovska| Audra Ricketts| Robyn Ross| Ivan Cermak| Michael Daingerfield| Alana Husband| Brent Chapma
Episode.Overview: After arriving home, Tim starts to worry when he learns that Jenny has vanished. Bette travels to New York for an art opening and her relationship with Tina is put to the test. Back in Los Angeles, the sperm donor's girlfriend discovers a lonely Tina and starts to harass her.

Episode.GuestStars: |Aaron Douglas| Beverly Breuer| Michael Hogan| Clint Carleton| Lori Ann Triolo| Adrian Holmes| Devon Casagrande| Morgan Brayton| Alana Husband| Robyn Ross| Claude Knowlton| Jonathan Scarfe| Roger Haskett| Sherry Thoreson| Camille Martinez| Zak Santiago| H
Episode.Overview: Tina and Bette are stunned when their friends say their impending parenthood has made them boring. Jenny stays at Marina's when Tim throws her out but she is shocked to learn the truth about Marina's personal life. Dana rejects Lara as her sponsorship contract hangs on the line.

Episode.GuestStars: |Rebecca Harker| Ecstasia Sanders| James Purcell| Cole Walliser| Jay Williams| Obi Edwards| Vicky Lambert| Karen Holness| Richard O'Sullivan| Charles Payne| Kennedy Goodkey| Gerry South| Donny Lucas| Gwenm Eyre| Joe MacLeod| Mikka Dargel| Carmen Aguirre|
Episode.Overview: When Jenny's old roommate (guest star Sarah Strange) from college comes to stay, Jenny decides to use the opportunity to reveal the details about her affair with Marina. Bette and Tina join a group in preparation for becoming parents, and Dana faces a tough time when she must come out to her conservative parents.

Episode.GuestStars: |Russell Zishiri| Charles Payne| David Berner| Alfonso Quijada| Samantha McLeod| James Purcell| Roger Haskett| Sherry Thoreson| Claude Knowlton| Jonathan Scarfe| Camille Martinez| Zak Santiago| Barclay Hope| Damon Johnson| Joseph Marshall| Michaela Mann|
Episode.Overview: Shane gets the opportunity to style a high-profile client's hair, Bette and Tina receive some devastating news, Jenny goes to dinner with Marina and Francesca, and Alice decides that her relationship with Lisa is too complex.

Episode.GuestStars: |Andrea Whitburn|Sarah Widdows|Kate Robbins|Dorothy Fehr|Tara Wilson|Jennifer Kitchen|Penelope Corrin|Kirsten Williamson|Harley Reiner|Maggie Blue O'Hara|Alison Fraser|Robin Nielsen|Tiffany Sweeney|Shira Moss|Marta Jaciubek|Kyle Cassie|
Episode.Overview: Bette is worried about Tina when she throws herself into volunteer work, Marina and Francesca get into an argument, Alice thinks she may be pregnant by Lisa, and Dana and Jenny try to console each other.

Episode.GuestStars: |Luvia Petersen| Tristin Leffler| Marco Soriano| Veena Sood| Zak Santiago| Tygh Runyan| John Murphy| Samantha McLeod| Scott Logie| Biski Gugushe| Claude Duhamel| Nicola Cavendish| Winston Brown| Carmen Aguirre| Leslie Hopps| Brenda Campbell|
Episode.Overview: Tina, Jenny, Shane, Alice and Dana all share an eventful trip to Palm Springs. While on the road, they all share their "first love" stories. Back in Los Angeles, Bette hires Candace, an attractive carpenter, to handle the set-up of the "Provocations" exhibit opening at the gallery.

Episode.GuestStars: |Miles Meadows| Duncan Minett| Sean Campbell| Michael-Ann Connor| Zak Santiago| Tygh Runyan| Samantha McLeod| James Purcell|
Episode.Overview: After a riot at the gallery, the entire gang ends up in jail. Shane rejects Clea's affections, Jenny goes on a date, and Marina makes a move on Robin as she prepares for Drag King night at The Planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Mark Houghton|Luciana Carro|Sandra-Jessica Couturier|Rekha Sharma|Peter Kelamis|Jacqueline Samuda|Jennifer Jasey|Mark Gibson|Bill Mondy|Dan Payne|Gina Holden|Bruno Verdoni|Leanne Adachi|Alonso Oyarzun|Laurie Papou|Aynsley Amy|Samantha Simmonds|
Episode.Overview: As the "Provocations" opening approaches, Bette struggles with a temptation. After some sad news, Dana turns to Tonya, leaving Alice unhappy. Shane tries to let Clea down gently but it backfires in her face.

Episode.GuestStars: |Luciana Carro|Cassandra Sawtell|Alison Matthews|Angela Bohn|Lydia Castro|Debra Donohue|Nina Pousette|Brenda Crichlow|Tygh Runyan|Matty Finochio|Eric Mabius|Arianna Huffington|
Episode.Overview: As Bette desperately begs for Tina's forgiveness, Tina herself is hiding a shocking secret from Bette and all her friends. Alice and Dana continue to hide their romantic trysts from the others, and Jenny finds herself saying goodbye to Tim as he prepares to leave.

Episode.GuestStars: |Luvia Petersen| Rosette Sharma| Katie Ritchie| Debora Cohen| Shelby Stocks| Barclay Hope| Jill Christensen| Fabrice Grover| Graeme Duffy| Francine Cohen| Dena Robb| Crystal Lowe| Kirsten Williamson| Stacy Fair| Lois Anderson| Holly Ferguson| Michael Hogan| Genoa Smith| Ashley Webber| Chris William Martin| Derek de Lint|
Episode.Overview: Acting on Alice's advice, Tina decides to hire a famous lawyer. Dana and Alice struggle to stay away from each other, Ivan gives Kit the cold shoulder, and Jenny decides to have a serious discussion with Robin regarding their relationship.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tony Abatemarco| Fabrice Grover| Peter Shinkoda| Michael Karl Richards| Samantha Banton| Barclay Hope| Gary Jones| Tony Salvatore| Elizabeth Ziff| Ted
Episode.Overview: When she is rejected from the writing class, Jenny sets out to win over her intimidating professor. Tina is devastated when she finds an email from Candace on Bette's computer, Dana and Alice continue to hide their attraction for each other, and Kit tries to find an opening act for her new club.

Episode.GuestStars: |Daniela Buzzi| Cassandra Sawtell| Heather Douglas| Audra Ricketts| Gina Holden| Joe Towne| Sam Easton| Tina Milo Milivojevic| Zoran Vukelic| Julie Patzwald| Matthew McInnis| Sarah Lind| Marnie Robinson| Mike Dopud| Brent Clark| Randall Barkman| Leslie Jones| Meg Roe| Michael Tayles| Kea Wong| Mimi Kuzyk| Camryn Manheim|
Episode.Overview: Bette travels to New York on a business trip. Tina is shocked and angry about her lawyer's true intentions. Jenny and Shane search for a new roommate, and Kit bonds with an inspirational speaker.

Episode.GuestStars: |Marsha Regis| Kim Paris| Ruth Nichol| Terence Kelly| Bruce James| Josephine Jacob| Monique Ganderton| Jeff Ellingson| Wendy Morrow Donaldson| Gina Doty| Sefton Fincham| Alisen Down| Kyle J. Downes| Camryn Manheim|
Episode.Overview: Bette tries to fix her relationship with Tina, but she gets a rude awakening with some bad news both at home and work. Alice and Dana try taking their relationship to a different level, Shane starts her new job as a PA to Veronica Bloom (guest star Camryn Manheim), and Jenny gets some confidence from her new hairstyle.

Episode.GuestStars: |Bob Glouberman| Stefanie Von Pfetten| Vangelis Stoudis| Chris William Martin| Heather Douglas| Leanne Adachi| Melissa Rivers|
Episode.Overview: Alice pushes Dana to break up with Tonya, but Dana isn't prepared for when Tonya reveals her own secret. Tina considers her new attraction to Helena, Kit finally hooks up with Benjamin, and Jenny and Carmen continue to enjoy each other's company.

Episode.GuestStars: |Camille Sullivan| Mackenzie Gray| Jordan Medina| Kyle J. Downes| Alyson Palmer| Sharon Isbin| Fabrice Grover| Cobie Smulders| Dan Wynands| Tamiko Whitsett| Elias Lucero| Sophie Holt| Matt McColm| Christine Lippa| Sarah Penikett| Warren Christie| Ona Grau
Episode.Overview: Shane tries to dull her pain in the hopes that she can forget about Carmen and Jenny's blossoming relationship. Tina comes between Helena and her ex over the custody of their kids and offers a glimmer of hope to Bette. Dana and Alice call everyone to The Planet to announce their new relationship.

Episode.GuestStars: |Christopher Shyer| David Richmond-Peck| Brendan Penny| Dion Luther| Sarah Hayward| Michelle Harrison| Guy Demong| Pablo Coffey| Warren Christie| Eileen Bui| Cameron MacDonald| Guinevere Turner| Sara Botsford| Melissa Leo| Tony Goldwyn|
Episode.Overview: When Alice runs into her ex, she is surprised to find out that she is now dating Dana's ex-girlfriend. Bette and Tina reach an agreement over their relationship, Jenny is worried that she may have lost a writing job, and Shane finds some comfort in a church.

Episode.GuestStars: |Roy Duquette| Lori Ann Triolo| David Richmond-Peck| Mikela J. Mikael| Kelly-Ruth Mercier| Tammy Hui| Agam Darshi| Graem Beddoes| Judith Maxie| Daryl Shuttleworth| Camryn Manheim| Tony Goldwyn|
Episode.Overview: Dana is stunned when Alice requests a bold sexual favor from her. Burr Connor (guest star Tony Goldwyn) reveals a secret to Jenny. Jenny learns about Carmen's real feelings for Shane, Kit plans a romantic night for Benjamin, and Bette and Tina have an intimate encounter as they bond over their unborn baby.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sylvia Rhue| Preston Cook| Jeremy Crittenden| Joy Walker| Amy Ziff| Angela Uyeda| Daryl Shuttleworth| Sara Botsford| Torie Osborn| Shawn Colvin| Saskia Gould| Kelly Parks| Ronald Selmour| Tosca Baggoo| Ossie Davis| Katy Selverstone|
Episode.Overview: A lesbian cruise in the Caribbean proves eventful for Dana, Alice, Shane, Jenny and Carmen. Bette and Kit struggle to reconcile with their estranged father, Melvin, during his visit.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tyler Johnston| Linda Ko| Victoria Billingsley| Heather Doerksen| Omari Forrester| Stephen Aberle| Andrew Francis| Gina Stockdale| Carrie Fleming| Jenn Forgie| Cobie Smulders| Brad Dryborough| Iris Paluly| Heather Douglas| Jeremy Kulyk| Bruce Carmichael| Brandon Arron| Cyrcee Perreault| James Pizzinato| Marco Galvani| Eric Breker| Ossie Davis|
Episode.Overview: Dana is stunned when she learns a big secret about her brother, Howie, at Gay Pride 2005. Mark tries to make amends with Jenny and Shane, Kit and Bette learn that their father, Melvin, is refusing treatment for his illness, and a shocking memory about Jenny's childhood is revealed.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cobie Smulders| Sonya Salomaa| Linda Ko| Emily Holmes| Peaches| Don Thompson| Ryan Booth| Jenn Forgie| Ossie Davis|
Episode.Overview: Bette reaches out to Tina as she decides to take her father home for his final days. Jenny struggles after recalling a difficult memory from her childhood, and Alice becomes jealous when Dana agrees to have dinner with her ex-girlfriend, Lara.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nadine States| Candus Churchill| Georgia Craig| Lovie Eli| Marcus Mosely| Will Sanders| Debbie Shair| Michael Inez| Craig Bartock| Tom Pickett| Ann Wilson| Benjamin Smith| Ted
Episode.Overview: A surprise guest shows up at a sad event as Bette gets stunning news about her job. Tina goes into a surprisingly difficult labor, Jenny finally reaches breaking point over her painful childhood memory, Alice struggles with her jealousy, and Peggy Peabody lays down the laws with her daughter, Helena.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cynthia Stevenson| Tamara Prescott| Leanna Nash| Marilyn Norry| Annabel Kershaw| Kate Clinton| Colin Lawrence| Paralee Cook| Margot Kidder| Michelle Candido| Esmeralda Fortin| Patricia Mayen-Salazar| Maria Dimou| Franco Maravilla| Elena Murzello| Stephen
Episode.Overview: Bette and Tina deal with parenting Angelica while attempting to rekindle their relationship and handle an obnoxious social worker. Alice has a traffic accident, Helena gets into the movie business, Carmen and Shane's relationship gets more serious as Carmen takes her to meet the parents, and Jenny, recovering at her parents', has had enough with the Midwest and ponders moving back to L.A. with her new girlfriend Moira.

Episode.GuestStars: |Magda Apanowicz| Shay Kuebler| Tyler Johnston| Aaron Brooks| Brendan Bailey| Shawn Ayers| Benjamin Arthur| Shawn Reis| Tamara Lashley| Jason McKinnon| Beverley Elliott| Tom McBeath| Katrina Fields| Elfina Luk| Tammy Bentz| Yvette Narlock| Mark Epstein| L
Episode.Overview: Kit hires a party promoter to get the business up at The Planet. Jenny and Moira run into hateful rednecks on their way back to California. Carmen's mother tries to make Shane more feminine, Bette and Tina try to find a male role model for Angelica, Helena helps Alice get over her obsession with Dana, while Dana herself deals with health problems.

Episode.GuestStars: |Chelah Horsdal| Tommy Danielowski| Elizabeth Weinstein| Patricia Idlette| Judith Maxie| Susan Mosher| John Gray| Frazey Ford| Naomi Joy Gallagher| Laura Mennell| Keram Malicki-Sanchez|
Episode.Overview: Shane opens her own styling business, and Bette loses her position as the sole provider for the family, forcing Tina to take up a job under Helena. Now back in L.A., Jenny introduces Moira to her surprised friends. Dana and Lara make plans to visit France while Alice still obsesses over Dana. Meanwhile, Kit is surprised by The Planet's new manager who wants to make some drastic changes to the place.

Episode.GuestStars: |Naomi Joy Gallagher| Derek McIver| Duncan Minett| Michael Ryan| Paul Anthony| Elise Lebrun| Carl McDonald| Lisa Howell| Gillian Hutchison| Nicholas Treeshin| Stephen Powell| Keram Malicki-Sanchez| Russell Simmons| Billie Jean King| Dana Delany| Susan Mosher| Bif Naked|
Episode.Overview: While Tina and Helena attend a documentary screening, Bette leaves for Washington D.C. to speak at a Senate hearing and meets with Senator Barbara Grisham. Attempting to provide for both herself and Moira, Jenny puts her dreams of becoming a writer on hold and starts waitressing at The Planet. Jenny and Moira are also invited to a party hosted by Billie Blaikie where Moira meets like-minded people. Meanwhile, Carmen has to decide whether to give up Shane's opening party in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to DJ at an exclusive VIP party, and Dana plays at a tennis tournament and declares her love for Lara in front of TV cameras.

Episode.GuestStars: |Andrew McNee| Denis Krasnogolov| Andrew Airlie| Tara Janicki| Adam Thomas| Tammy Gillis| David Lewis| Paul Popowich| Brendan Penny| Derek McIver| Erica Cerra| Keram Malicki-Sanchez| Ann-Marie MacDonald|
Episode.Overview: As Tina finds herself attracted to men, Bette explores Buddhism and also hears good news on the work front. Both Alice and Kit try out speed-dating; Kit with Angelica's male nanny Angus and Alice with a lesbian vampire. Meanwhile, Dana receives devastating news about her illness, Helena pursues documentarist Dylan Moreland, Moira goes out as Max, and Shane's ex drops by to see her.

Episode.GuestStars: |P. Lynn Johnson| Brendan Penny| Barbara Kottmeier| Michael Hogan| Andrew Airlie| Ellie Harvie| Callum Keith Rennie| Corin Tucker| Carrie Brownstein| Janet Weiss| Geoff Gustafson| Pamela Diaz| Suzanne Bastien| Richard Keats|
Episode.Overview: Bette gives Tina her consent -- and a possible ultimatum -- to explore her feelings for men. Jenny meets with a publisher about her manuscript for a book, Billie makes Moira a tempting, but shady offer, Kit gives in to Angus' advances, and Carmen lays down the law to Shane regarding their relationship. Alice offers her support to Lara and celebrations are cut short when the girls finally find out the truth about Dana's condition.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alan Cumming| Keith Strickland| Fred Schneider| Paul Popowich| Patti Allan| Rob DeLeeuw| P. Lynn Johnson| Dave McGowan| Eileen Bui| Panthea| Meghan Gardiner| Justina Kervel| Kate Pierson| Eve Ensler| Deirdre Blades| Randi Lynne| Erica Cerra|
Episode.Overview: Tina takes a business trip to Canada and has a chance to explore her feelings for the opposite sex. Dana's treatment puts a strain on her and Lara's relationship. Meanwhile, Jenny helps Moira in her transformation to Max, Carmen and Shane dedicate parts of their bodies to each other, Alice reverts back in her obsession over Dana, and Kit takes control. In a special appearance the B-52's perform at The Planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brynn Horrocks| Carlos Andrés Gómez| Zach Carter| Carrie Close| Malcolm Stewart| Paul Silveira| Tracy Bonham| Nona Hendryx| Elizabeth Ziff| Amy Ziff| Alyson Palmer| Cynthia Stevenson| Malaika Jackson|
Episode.Overview: Jenny plans a charity event to support Max when they find out he can't pay for the top surgery. Helena takes the girls to a surprise trip to honor Dana in her recovery, and Carmen is still dealing with the aftermath of Shane's ex. Meanwhile, Bette kicks Tina out of the bedroom and tries to find peace in Buddhism. In a recording studio, Kit gets help from unexpected sources -- but is it too much to handle?

Episode.EpisodeName: Lead, Follow, Or Get Out of the Way
Episode.GuestStars: |Tracy Bonham| Yvonne Myers| Tara Fynn| Holly Dignard| Eileen Bui| Callum Keith Rennie| Steven Eckholdt| Elena Murzello| Alex Ferris| Irene Olga Lopez| Maria Dimou| Patricia Mayen-Salazar| Susan Love| Alexandra Hedison| Will Radford| John Henry Reardon| Fin Gareau| Kurt Max Runte| Justine Warrington| Esmeralda Fortin| Carlo Fanella| Caleb Rogers| Franco Maravilla|
Episode.Overview: As Bette has hard time adjusting to the ascetic lifestyle at the Buddhist retreat, Tina goes on a date with a divorced man. Dana, friends again with Alice, is looking forward to a new career. Jenny throws a benefit party for Max but is appalled by his increasingly aggressive behavior. Meanwhile, Carmen tells the truth to her family, and Helena is served with a lawsuit.

Episode.GuestStars: |Sonya Anand| Lorena Gale| Derek James| Evan Adams| Claudette Mink| Peter Wingfield| David Lovgren| Kwesi Ameyaw| Georgia Craig| Callum Keith Rennie| Steven Eckholdt| Alexandra Hedison| Ryan Robbins| Agam Darshi| Doris Chillcott| Christina Jastrzembska| David Abbott| Panou| Eric Mabius| Zara Taylor| Caleb Rogers| Tara Fynn|
Episode.Overview: While Lara is vacationing in Paris, oblivious, Dana's condition takes a turn for the worse. Alice runs into Dana's ex, Jenny introduces Max to a man from her past, Carmen evens the score with Shane, and Peggy Peabody flies to town to help her daughter. Frustrated, Bette leaves the Buddhist retreat but receives a dose of life wisdom from an unexpected source.

Episode.GuestStars: |Aaron Craven| Caleb Rogers| Landy Cannon| Andrew Francis| Susan Hogan| Michael Hogan| Alexandra Hedison| Steven Eckholdt|
Episode.Overview: After Dana's family treats the girls coldly, Alice is determined to arrange a special event to commemorate their friend. While Helena's lawsuit is resolved with a surprising outcome, Bette is willing to fight for Angelica's custody. Max lands a job, giving Jenny something to write about. Dealing with her grief, Shane is willing to make the ultimate commitment to Carmen. Finally, Lara arrives from Paris and is comforted by Alice.

Episode.GuestStars: |Elena Murzello| Sarah-Jane Redmond| Aidan Jarrar| Michael Jansen| Shaun Garrett| Maria Dimou| Kaaren deZilva| Wendy Dawson| Olivia Windbiel| Bruce Dawson| Chilton Crane| Aubrey Arnason| She| God-Des| Isabella Hofmann| Irene Olga Lopez| Elodie Bouchez| Steven Eckholdt| Holland Taylor| Eric Roberts|
Episode.Overview: Wedding plans occupy the girls, and Shane is reunited with her family. Helena pitches in to have Carmen's family flown to Canada, Jenny and Max drift apart, and Kit has stunning news. Peggy Peabody reconnects with her daughter -- but does it last? Finally, Tina has second thoughts about Angelica's custody arrangements, leading Bette to take desperate measures to be with her daughter.

Episode.GuestStars: |Karina Lombard| Layla Barron| Camille Atebe| Oscar Parry| Paul Anthony| Evin Taylor| Jane Lynch| DJ Hicks| Kristopher Shepard| Chuck Mayne| Sarah-Jane Redmond| Victoria Bidewell| Sandra Timuss| Elodie Bouchez| Peter Wingfield|
Episode.Overview: After the events in Canada, Bette is on the run from authorities with her daughter. Shane reverts back to her old habits but gets a surprise from her father's wife. Meanwhile, Helena tries to get used to living without her mother's money, Max attends a support group, and Kit has trouble with her pregnancy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alberto Davila Jr.| James Michael Bobby| Tristin Leffler| Mark Krysko| Nikki Boyer| Shawn Ridout| Peter Hanlon| Rasika Mathur| Matias Hacker| Chilton Crane| Alex Rockhill| Jessica Capshaw| Lynn A. Henderson| Shaker Paleja| Heather Matarazzo| Juan Carlos
Episode.Overview: Alice meets Papi, a girl who lights up on The Chart even more than Shane. Jenny is interviewed by a gay writer. Bette's new boss has some surprising news for her. After Helena's departure, a new guy takes the reins at the studio as Tina's new boss. Meanwhile, Max goes out on a date with a straight girl.

Episode.GuestStars: |Miles Meadows| Jessica Capshaw| Elizabeth Marleau| Chelsea Hobbs| Carrie Colak| Alfred E. Humphreys| Chilton Crane|
Episode.Overview: Tina throws a cocktail party to get her gay and straight friends to know each other better. Penniless Helena is looking for a job. Shane takes care of her little brother, Angus' band is on the verge of a breakthrough, and at the art college, Bette's teaching assistant is having feelings for her. Meanwhile, Phyllis attends a ladies-only Texan night at The Planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Beverley Breuer| Jeanie Cloutier| Caroline Cave| Liza Ulrych| Deryl Hayes| Donna White| Chelsea Hobbs| Ulla Friis| Jessica Capshaw|
Episode.Overview: Bette meets the new resident artist, Jodi, but a controversial arts project in her class upsets a potential donor for the college. Papi challenges Alice and the girls to a basketball game. Max reveals a secret to his girlfriend. Jenny schemes her way into meeting Stacey Merkin's girlfriend. Meanwhile, Shane is struggling to scrape up money for a hospital bill.

Episode.GuestStars: |Caroline Cave| MacGareo Thomas| Fraser Corbett| Alyssa Pridham| Ken Tremblett| Pablo Silveira| Dean Paul Gibson| Bryan Demore| Ulla Friis| Bruce Davison| Heather Matarazzo| Steven Eckholdt|
Episode.Overview: Bette's forbidden relationship with her TA, Nadia, could jeopardize her career. Alice, on the other hand, ends her affair with a married woman after meeting her husband. She also gets upset by one of Jenny's short stories which gets published in a magazine. Meanwhile, Angus is caught in a compromising position.

Episode.GuestStars: |Daniel Bacon| Andre Fex| Grace Sherman| Alyssa Pridham| Vanessa Tomasino| David Lewis| Bruce Dawson| G. Patrick Currie| Marc Dion| Enid-Raye Adams| Guy Fauchon| Carrie Anne Fleming| Caroline Cave| Heather Matarazzo|
Episode.Overview: The girls attend a movie premiere sponsored by Shane's underwear campaign. Papi teaches Helena and Alice how to play poker for a high-stakes private game hosted by a high-profile female gambler. Bette disagrees with Tina about Angelica's education, and goes on a date with Jodi. Meanwhile, Phyllis is having trouble letting go of Alice.

Episode.GuestStars: |Cybill Shepherd| Brian Markinson| Alfred E. Humphreys| Peter Benson| Sam Sabbah| Haili Page Philippe| Cheryl Hunter| Evan Jensen| Camille Mitchell| Crystal Balint|
Episode.Overview: Tina's boss orders her to get the movie rights for Jenny's Lez Girls. Helena considers whether she should take up on Catherine's offer to pay off her gambling debt. Paige and Shane volunteer at Shay's school to teach the kids about tolerance. Meanwhile, Alice and Tasha take it slow, and Bette learns something about Jodi's past that puts kinks in their relationship.

Episode.GuestStars: |Valerie Tian| Jason Schombing| Michael Phenicie| Kevin Crofton| Camille Mitchell| Simone Bailly| Alex Ferris| Eileen Bui| Kristanna Loken| Eric Roberts|
Episode.Overview: Tina gets introduced to Jodi, and has second thoughts about leaving the lesbian life behind. Alice and Tasha argue heatedly over politics. Max hires an intern to help him with the workload on OurChart. While Shane and Paige steam up the car windows, and Catherine and Helena make a winning team at the poker tables, the rest of the girls attend the unveiling of Kit's new single at The Planet.

Episode.GuestStars: |Tara Nicole Schwartz| Nina McNeely| Justine Clark| Lisa Eaton| Tara Avise| Nanci Anderson| Gabrielle Rose| Peter Hanlon| Igor Morozov| John Stockwell| Garry Marshall| Lawrence Bender| Joey Aresco| Amanda Barrett| Abby DeWald| Anna Campbell| Andrew Hedge| Kristanna Loken| Karina Lombard| Deanne Bray| Cybill Shepherd| Simone Bailly| Daniella Evangelista| Bruce Dawson| Daniel Bacon| Tanya Champoux| Peter Jenkins| Eric Roberts| Bruce Davison|
Episode.Overview: Jenny and Tina look for the right movie director but butt heads over creative differences. Phyllis' husband drops by unannounced at Alice's place. Bette is falling hard for Jodi and lets her emotions interfere with her work. Kit manages to crack through Papi's hard outer shell – with unexpected consequences.

Episode.GuestStars: |Annabella Sciorra| Simone Bailly| Winston Rekert| Deanne Bray| Kristanna Loken| Tara Frederick| Fran Gebhard| Ken Camroux| Myk Gordon| Robin Douglas| Aleks Holtz| Haley Beauchamp| Jackson Allan|
Episode.Overview: The girls spend a day at the horse tracks where Catherine and Helena risk it all. Max takes Grace home to meet his estranged family. Bette hosts a dinner party but her obsession over every detail gets on Jodi's nerves. Meanwhile, Jenny and Tina agree on a director, Kate Arden, who quickly becomes interested in Tina.

Episode.GuestStars: |Bruce Davison| Annabella Sciorra| Clementine Shepherd-Ford| David Lewis| Grace Sherman| Larry Kennar| Crystal Balint| Bruce Dawson| Peter Hanlon| Simone Bailly| Jackson Allan| Jon Wolfe Nelson| Cybill Shepherd| Steven Eckholdt|
Episode.Overview: Bette finds out that Jodi's been offered a job at an art center on the East Coast. Tasha's memories of the war continue to haunt her, and she is ordered to keep her sexual orientation a secret. Meanwhile, Shane plans a surprise for Paige, Helena is kicked out of the hotel, and Max comes to a decision regarding his job.

Episode.GuestStars: |Karin Konoval| Ben Ayres| Toshi Reagon| Aidan Jarrar| Jackson Allan| Jon Wolfe Nelson| Cybill Shepherd| Erin Daniels| Heather Matarazzo| Jane Lynch| Annabella Sciorra| Kristanna Loken| Olivia Windbiel|
Episode.Overview: Bette seeks Tina's advice on how to get Jodi back, but is surprised to learn that Tina no longer wants to be straight. Alice is devastated when Tasha is called in for another tour in Iraq. Meanwhile, Phyllis seeks divorce, Jenny is excluded in any decisions regarding the movie, and Helena frees herself from her entanglement with Catherine.

Episode.GuestStars: Joanna Reid|Tamara Lee Noonan|Lucia Walters|Lindsay Maxwell|Patrick Sabongui|Julius Chapple|Dwayne Bryshun|Nicola Anderson|Kathryn Kirkpatrick|Anna Hagan|Joanne Wilson|Lara Babalola|Venus Terzo|Glynis Davies|Lucia Rijker
Episode.Overview: Following the events of the season finale, Helena is imprisoned and no one can get a hold of her mother. Jenny finds a rich investor and schemes her way to directing Lez Girls the movie. Shane is about to sign a lease on a house with Paige. The Planet hosts a coming-out party for Phyllis, where Alice and Shane attempt to hook Tina up with someone who isn't Bette. Meanwhile, Bette is waiting for Jodi to come back home from New York.

Episode.GuestStars: Lynda Boyd|Barbara Kottmeier|Michelle Morgan|Alberta Mayne|Alexis Kellum Creer|Anthony McRae|Lenore Zann|Pamela Diaz|Charlie Carrick
Episode.Overview: Jenny's boss's daughter is getting married and Shane gets a gig as the hair stylist at her wedding. Kit and Max spot a young girl who's obsessed with Jenny's work and hook her up with her dream job. Alice and Tasha go on a double-date with Bette and Jodi. Meanwhile in prison, Helena is rescued by her cell mate.

Episode.GuestStars: John Pyper-Ferguson
Episode.Overview: Jodi brings Bette to meet and hang out with her friends but Bette has a hard time letting go of control. Shane decides to give up on sex and instead pours her energy in exercising. Tasha faces new allegations. Meanwhile, Helena finally gets comfortable in prison but things are about to change when her mother turns up.

Episode.GuestStars: Alicia Leigh Willis|Kate French
Episode.Overview: Tina and Jenny squabble over casting the lead role in Lez Girls. An incident at Alice's place triggers a change in Captain Beech's view on Tasha's defense. Being celibate takes its toll on Shane and she reaches a breaking point. Alice encourages Tasha to go with her to a "Secret Love" party for closeted gays and lesbians. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang attends the opening of the city's hottest new lesbian club, SheBar.

Episode.GuestStars: Kate French|Patricia Velasquez|Alicia Leigh Willis|Wendy Glenn|Angela Gots|Michelle Harrison|Amber Borycki|Dominic Zamprogna|Michael Daingerfield
Episode.Overview: Jenny throws a party for the girls to get to meet their movie counterparts -- with mixed results. Shane stirs up drama between Dawn and Cindi, which escalates into bitter rivalry between The Planet and SheBar. Meanwhile, Alice is stunned by a basketball star's gay-bashing on national TV.

Episode.GuestStars: Wendy Glenn|Angela Gots|Chelah Horsdal|Dominic Zamprogna
Episode.Overview: The production of Lez Girls starts and Jenny runs into unexpected difficulties. When Adele impresses her on location scouting, Jenny treats her to a makeover. Dawn and Cindi try their best to sabotage Kit's business. Phyllis' daughter Molly catches Shane's eye. Meanwhile, Tina and Bette rekindle their passion.

Episode.GuestStars: Dawn Chubai|Sandra Mayo|Donnelly Rhodes|Aaron Craven|Brenda Campbell|Katey Wright|Danielle Kremeniuk|Kelly McGillis|Patricia Velasquez
Episode.Overview: Niki's antics off and on set cause nightmares for her agent as well as the production team. Alice learns that in order to land the high-profile talk show gig, she needs to out people on live TV. Bette takes Phyllis' daughter Molly to visit the movie set. She's beyond bored until Shane takes her to SheBar to see lesbian oil wrestling. Meanwhile, Tasha meets the visiting prosecutor who's about to go against her in the trial.

Episode.GuestStars: Kelly McGillis|Aaron Craven|Denalda Williams|Danielle Kremeniuk|Dominic Zamprogna|Tanya Champoux|Sean Bell|Aaron Pearl|Crystal Bublé|Conrad Whitaker|Andy Stahl|Chantal Jarry|Kaspar Michaels|Reese Alexander
Episode.Overview: Niki's multi-million dollar action movie opens, but allegations about her sexuality lead Tina and her manager to suggest she take a date -- a male date -- to the premiere. Jenny is banned from the theater causing Adele to take the reins for the evening. Shane and Molly continue to play mind games with each other. Jodi throws a dinner party to some couples, and Bette is devastated to learn Tina and her date are also invited. Meanwhile, Tasha goes on trial and Alice delivers a shocking statement.

Episode.GuestStars: Dominic Zamprogna|Danielle Kremeniuk|Sandra Mayo
Episode.Overview: Jenny gets jealous on the set when a love scene between Niki and her on-screen boyfriend looks too realistic. Dawn Denbo invites the girls to a mafia-themed night to settle the dispute between The Planet and SheBar. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina decide to go see a couples counselor when they're interrupted by a rolling blackout due to a heat wave.

Episode.GuestStars: Clementine Ford (Molly Kroll)|Jon Wolfe Nelson (Tom)
Episode.Overview: The girls attend the Subaru Pink Ride to support breast cancer research. Tina is furious for Niki blowing her cover with Jenny but Adele assures her the two won't be seen together publicly. Meeting old friends prompts Tasha to ponder her long-term plans in life. A campfire game of "I never" turns into a discussion on cheating -- with devastating results.

Episode.GuestStars: Amber Borycki|Melanie Lynskey|Danielle Kremeniuk|Aaron Craven|Brenda Campbell
Episode.Overview: After the revelation at the Pink Ride, Jodi vows to fight for Bette. Tasha and Alice look for a house together, and at work, Alice meets a New Zealander fashion designer. Adele finally reveals her master plan: to take over the movie. Finally, Dawn Denbo and lover Cindi deliver a blow that pushes Kit over the edge.

Episode.GuestStars: Benjamin Ratner|Sandra Mayo|Chelah Horsdal|Robert Weiss|Melanie Lynskey
Episode.Overview: The two Peabody ladies return to L.A. and Helena makes a tempting offer to lover Cindi. While Tasha has trouble fitting in in her new job, Alice has a fun day out with fashion designer Clea Mason. Bette gives a speech in honor of Jodi at the opening of her latest exhibition, but she is shocked by Jodi's new media installation. Phyllis demands Shane not to ruin her daughter's future. Finally, at the wrap-up party for Lez Girls, Jenny thanks the girls for their loyalty and friendship but is about to get a nasty surprise.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: Shane tries to deal with her betrayal to Jenny as they both attempt to figure out their feelings for one another. Shane awkwardly tries to apologize to Jenny, who responds by threatening to evict Shane from her house. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina get worried when Angelica comes down with a fever which gradually gets worse. Alice and Tasha cannot decide whether to break up or stay together since their different views on life strain their romance to the breaking point. Elsewhere, Helena and Kit celebrate after taking over SheBar nightclub and formally rename the place, 'HIT!'

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: Bette and Tina talk about expanding their family and beginning a new life but the plan could be ruined when Bette bumps into an old friend with dangerous potential; Alice and Tasha ponder their compatibility as they seek counseling; an old flame appears, sending Helena reeling; and Max is faced with an extraordinary situation.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: The negative of “Lez Girls” goes missing; Shane’s incessant apologizing to Jenny finally gets noticed; Alice’s feelings are hurt when Jenny denounces her desire to write a screenplay; Phyllis lets Bette in on a suppressed secret; and it’s opening night at Kit and Helena’s new club, HIT!

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: Shane and Jenny are still melting over each other; Bette and Tina go to Nevada to meet a potential birth mother; Max is trying to deal with being pregnant; Alice and Tasha play matchmaker; and Kelly Wentworth may have what Bette needs.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: Jenny writes another script that sells; Bette and Kelly go into business; Alice and Tasha have a third-wheel crush; the girls plot a sting operation to test Dylan; and, Jenny encroaches more on Shane.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: Jenny throws a baby shower for Max; Bette and Tina hit a roadblock in the adoption process; Bette goes solo to her gallery’s opening night celebration leading Kelly to go in for the kill; Shane is feeling boxed in by Jenny; and Alice starts to feel like three is a crowd.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: The Los Angeles Gay & Lesbian Center dance marathon is on; someone is moving to the Big Apple; rumors fly fast around the dance floor that Alice and Tasha may be in couple trouble; The HIT!’s Sunset Blvd makes a shocking revelation to Kit; and there’s a no-show at the bus station.

Episode.GuestStars: Marlee Matlin
Episode.Overview: In the final episode of the series, what starts out as a celebration of friendship quickly ends in a web of betrayal and deceit; the girls find themselves in the slammer with Sergeant Duffy; and the investigation into ? ? death begins…
